name: PONG Classic Edition
description:
Your favorite classic arcade game! Play the simple and fun game of PONG! It's the throwback game of your youth. Or if it's new to you, enjoy the game that many others have enjoyed before!

PONG is a table tennis sports game featuring simple two-dimensional graphics. Hit the ball to the opposing side and try to get it past the opposing paddle. Getting the ball past the your opponent scores a point! Do your best to prevent the ball from passing your paddle, otherwise your opponent scores.

FEATURES:
- Enjoy the classic game of PONG
- Choose between the Score to Win: 3, 5, 7, 10, or 15!
- Solo play against the CPU
- Game play gets faster the longer you go in between scores
- Challenging and fun game play!

FREE!

PLAY NOW!
